“To advance personal growth of the Next Generation”

Vision statement

“To establish an environment with free and easy access to real information and guidance for next chapter”

Values

  1. Next Gen cares: We care for what’s next, as the future lies in the next generation.
  2. Next Gen connects: We connect by creating a global network between alumni in professional setting and up-and-coming talent.
  3. Next Gen shares: We share our personal experience and knowledge from diverse fields of interest.
  4. Next Gen inspires: We inspire by personally investing in young people just like us from few years ago.

Mission statement

Our mission is to advance personal growth of the next generation by connecting students with alumni. Sharing experience is a key. It helps the youth to navigate through intricacies of life and prepare them for what is next. We believe access to guidance should be easy, so we made it that way. Because it is what we do today that will enhance tomorrow.


Mentors
